commit message: Add build target for common build scenarios to Android.mk

Update README.md

Added more build targets
Do not die if backend does not respond with binder

Update LocationBackendService.java

DeadObjectException is thrown if the callback is invalid (has died). The callback should thus be set to 'null' or we'll get an infinite series of exceptions :-)

Merge pull request #2 from rtreffer/patch-1

Update LocationBackendService.java

Merge pull request #4 from aelmahmoudy/patch-1

Set android.library=true in project.properties

Do not keep a dead backend open.

Do not try to unbind forever if the backend died (e.g. DeadObjectException).

Currently reinstalling an active backend may result in infinite exception spamming as dead backends are marked 'bound' and can never unbind (IllegalArgumentException).

Make only one try to unbind.

Merge pull request #10 from rtreffer/patch-2

Do not keep a dead backend open.
Use defined package version (not system version)
